questions.text: Who was in charge of the DEO when Hank was kidnapped?
questions.explanation:
Alex Danvers.

	Alex and Hank had been fighting, so her promotion was a surprise to her and Kara. "You two really did bury the hatchet didn't you?" Kara asked."Protocol had line of succession classified." Alex responded.

questions.text: What did Kara almost forget to wear when bringing Kat Grant her morning coffee?
questions.explanation:
her glasses.

	After Cat had accused her of being Supergirl in the end of the previous episode, Kara almost forgot to put her glasses on. She realized that she wasn't wearing them just seconds before Cat would have seen her without them on.

questions.text: What rank was Non in the Kryptonian army?
questions.explanation:
Lieutenant.

	He kidnapped Hank and held him hostage during the episode. His wife Astra had been arrested in a previous episode, and he offered to trade Hank for Astra. If they DEO didn't release Astra within 48 hours he threatened to kill Hank.

questions.text: Gen. Lane took over the DEO via a presidential order when he arrived at the base.
questions.explanation:
True.

	With Hank gone, Gen. Lane didn't want to leave Alex Danvers in charge.  His official goal was to return Director Henshaw to his post.

questions.text: While trying to prove that Kara was Supergirl, which movie did Cat question her about?
questions.explanation:
Titanic.

	Cat was trying to get Kara to slip up on facts and general knowledge she should have from her youth. Eventually she declared that no one would remember all of those minute details unless it was a cover story.

questions.text: Who broke into Maxwell Lord's facility?
questions.explanation:
James.

	He was assisted by Wynn who helped to take down security from the internet. James was caught and knocked unconscious.

questions.text: Supergirl broke Astra out of prison.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She did it after helping to capture Astra a few episodes earlier. The only way to get Henshaw back was to make the exchange. Gen. Lane refused, so Kara did it herself.

questions.text: How did Supergirl avoid a fight with the dozen or more Kryptonian soldiers?
questions.correct: Astra called off the fight before it started.
options: She used her freeze breath to escape.
She used a 3D projector to conceal her location.
She had Kryptonite hidden near the battlefield
questions.explanation:
Astra called off the fight before it started.

	Astra told Kara that avoiding the fight made them even and not to expect mercy like that again. Non was not happy about letting Kara go, but agreed to follow his wife and commanding officers' orders.

questions.text: Hank revealed to Kara he was from what planet?
questions.explanation:
Mars.

	He revealed to Kara that he was J'onn J'onzz, an alien from Mars. This was also the reason that Alex and he had been fighting earlier in the episode. Alex had discovered the subterfuge in the previous episode.

questions.text: How did Supergirl and Kara both appear to Cat at the same time?
questions.correct: J'onn J'onzz used his abilities to help.
options: It wasn't revealed in this episode how it was done.
Alex Danvers dressed as Supergirl and stood far across the room.
questions.explanation:
J'onn J'onzz used his abilities to help.

	J'onn shape shifted into Supergirl and they both met in Cat's office. That was one of several powers he revealed to Kara that he had.
